attributes.action: Abolish the General Medical Council of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We publicly feel that the General Medical Council (GMC) should be Statutorily Abolished in favour of a Medical Licensing Commission (MLC) ; to solely register and revalidate Doctors who practise Conventional Medicine in the UK.

We also recommend that the GMC/MLC urgently hands all disciplinary functions over to an Independent Clinical Tribunal (ICT) in keeping with the EU Convention on Human Rights ; to avoid (both) Institutional Bias and Multiple Jeopardy.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abolish the General Medical Council of the United Kingdom."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14674.asp

Prime Minister's Office
